name: Narde - long backgammon
description:
Narde is well known variation of the popular backgammon board game.
Initially all checkers of the player are located in the same position. The object of the game is to move all checkers around the board and bear them off.
There is no hitting in this game!

The Narde app offers the following features that enable you to get a better experience:
• Single player mode – play on your own, against strong AI
• Online mode – play over the Internet with any other player using the chips to bet and win

• Easy checkers move – one tap per movement
• Doubling cube - including the Crawford rule

• Fast matchmaking
• Cool graphic design, soundtrack and awesome sound effects!

The Narde app guarantees a 100% fair dice roll since all dice are rolled completely randomly, regardless of the player!

Now that you know, just download and enjoy!
